settings.promo_text: Scale Sale! add a scale to your order $10 Scale Sale!

settings.title: Oil Slick Silicone Pipes Rigs and Spoons
settings.content: Oil Slick makes PTFE and Silicone products. We make glass Jars, silicone smoking devices, Pipes, spoons, and so much more

settings.title: Oil Slick makes "tools to help you concentrate"
settings.content: Forprocessors, dabbers and smokers. Wemake unique solutions for everything sticky

settings.title: Dab Rigs
settings.text: Premium glass dab rigs for the smoothest concentrate experience. From mini rigs to recyclers.

settings.title: Bongs & Water Pipes
settings.text: High-quality glass bongs for flower enthusiasts. Beakers, straight tubes, and more.

settings.title: Hand Pipes
settings.text: Portable glass spoon pipes, chillums, and one-hitters. Perfect for on-the-go.

settings.title: Made in USA
settings.text: Support American glassblowers. Premium quality, handcrafted in the USA.

settings.title: Quartz Bangers
settings.text: Premium quartz bangers for perfect low-temp dabs. Multiple sizes and styles.

settings.title: Extraction & Packaging
settings.text: Professional-grade silicone mats, glass jars, and packaging supplies.

settings.title: Premium Dab Rigs
settings.text: Explore our collection of high-quality glass dab rigs. From mini rigs to recyclers, find the perfect piece for smooth, flavorful concentrates.

settings.title: Quartz Bangers and Accessories
settings.text: Upgrade your setup with premium quartz bangers, carb caps, and dab tools. Quality accessories for the perfect low-temp dab.

settings.title: Made in USA Glass
settings.text: Support American craftsmanship with our selection of USA-made glass pieces. Handcrafted quality from domestic glassblowers.

settings.pretext: Quality Glass and Accessories for Every Smoker
settings.title: Your One-Stop Smoke Shop

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more

settings.title: Best Glass Selection Online
settings.testimonial: Finally found a shop with quality glass at fair prices. My dab rig arrived perfectly packaged and hits like a dream.
settings.name: Marcus T.

settings.title: Fast Shipping, Great Products
settings.testimonial: Ordered a USA-made bubbler and some quartz bangers. Everything came in 3 days and the quality exceeded expectations.
settings.name: Jessica R.

settings.title: Perfect for Retail Buyers
settings.testimonial: Stocking our shop with Oil Slick products was the best decision. Bulk pricing is unbeatable and customers love them.
settings.name: David M.

settings.greeting_message: Hey there  got a question about a product, your order, or anything else? Drop us a message. We usually reply within a few hours during business hours.
